Pre-Game Insights: India are yet to be beaten in the World Cup so far; Sri Lanka have had a disappointing outing with two wins in six matches.
The match is significant as it is India's first ODI World Cup match at the Wankhede Stadium since 2011, against the same team that was the finalist then.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be live-streamed for free on Disney+ Hotstar for mobile users.
The Wankhede Stadium, known as the 'Sixth Six', has hosted ODI World Cup matches before.
Others: The live streaming will be available on Disney+ Hotstar, and betting odds are provided by Dafabet.
